description.value:
School conjuration (healing); Level cleric/oracle 9, shaman 9; Domain Healing 9;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets one or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless); Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions like heal, except as noted above. The maximum number of hit points restored to each creature is 250.

target.value: one or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
